name: TheTruth.exe
description:
This is more than just a game.

In TheTruth.exe you will find complex codes, grand adventures and a new outlook on your world. TheTruth.exe works to blend reality with the unreality, enticing its players with not only the impossible, but with the inability to gauge what is and isn't real. There is only one way to win. There can only be one winning team. It's a marathon and a race. Will you be able to discover what's at the end of this Alternate Reality Game? Or will someone else beat you to the end?

Once you purchase and download TheTruth.exe, everything becomes a clue to solving the next puzzle. After getting past the first test, you will be randomly grouped up with 9 other individuals of whom have passed their test as well. This will be your team. You and your team will then work to figure out how to beat the game, how to reach the end and work to solve all of the puzzles in TheTruth.exe.
